chunk:
Swiss Toniq Pure Cold-Pressed Rosehip Face Oil

Brand: Swiss Toniq

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Rosa Canina Fruit Oil
book: 3132-Swiss Toniq Pure Cold-Pressed Rosehip Face Oil

chunk: Directions: Apply a thin layer to the entire face and neck once or twice a day, before or after applying your Swiss Toniq serum or apply only this oil, then gently pat the skin to allow the oil to penetrate deeply. If you wear makeup, apply a very thin layer of oil to your face and neck and wait 5-10 minutes before applying makeup.
book: 3132-Swiss Toniq Pure Cold-Pressed Rosehip Face Oil

chunk: Warnings: Our pure rosehip oil is fresh and free from synthetic preservatives, so it must be used within 6 months of receiving it. As a living, natural product, it may deteriorate over time if not used promptly—please enjoy it while it's at its most potent.
book: 3132-Swiss Toniq Pure Cold-Pressed Rosehip Face Oil

chunk: Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
book: 3132-Swiss Toniq Pure Cold-Pressed Rosehip Face Oil
